text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Morning, Trainer! Are you ready to see<n>me fly?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Today's the Kikuka Sho! No more<n>practicing—this
is the real deal! ☆
choice_data_list: Show them how hard you've been working!
Show them how hard you've been working!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
The only thing left on the turf will be my<n>vapor
trail! ☆

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: I'll steal your attention and your heart,Trainer! ♪
